title: Cheesy chestnut galette
ingredients: ['250g long-grain brown rice', '2 tbsp olive oil', '2 onions, thinly sliced', '4 large celery sticks, thinly sliced', '1 large leek, thinly sliced', '1 tbsp finely chopped fresh sage', '200g vacuum-packed, peeled whole chestnuts, halved', '75g extra-mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '1 egg, beaten', 'few drops Tabasco sauce', 'TO GARNISH sprigs of fresh sage']
